snippet.title: Found! The ideal hobby farm
snippet.content: ON the Pomona side of fabulous Kin Kin and just 1.5km from the Village is a 15-acre farmlet, perfect for a few horses or cattle, with high paddocks featuring sensational views and an elevated second potential house site. The original farmhouse has four bedrooms, beautiful timber floors and a relaxing rear veranda with ramp access, a great space to sit and enjoy privacy and peace. Inside is comfortable and functional and there are exposed rafters in the front third of the house due to a renovation in the '90s. A second bathroom via the rear veranda has a second shower and doubles as a spacious laundry. There are two useful 6m x 7m sheds with space to fit four cars undercover and one has a high roof, perfect for a caravan or horse float. The superb thing about this property is the usable land. Next to the house and sheds is a chook yard, heaps of room for vegie gardens and a mature home orchard including mango, orange, guava and mulberry, all growing in fertile soil. An adjacent fenced horse paddock sits below another huge paddock, which is gently sloping and approximately three acres itself. Excellent pastures all irrigated via a small dam connected to a large 5000 gallon concrete water tank positioned high up in the paddock. On the southern boundary is another small dam next to a grassy access track, which is drivable in dry weather and leads to a high ridgeline with even better views than below. A top spot for a cabin with 360-degree vistas and well over 100 metres above sea level. Kin Kin has a fantastic primary school, a vibrant local cafe/general store and the historic Country Life Hotel, a central meeting spot for day-trippers and those fortunate enough to discover the Noosa Tracks and Trails network. KIN KIN 1055 Pomona-Kin Kin Rd 4 Bed, 2 Bath, 4 Car Features: Four-bedroom farmhouse plus sheds on 6.46ha, ideal as a hobby farm. Irrigated pastures, small dam Price: Offers over $419,000 Agent: George Andrews at Hargrave Real Estate Contact: 0477 703 429 5485 2200 Inspection: Saturday 10-11am Tourist track takes toll with plenty of motorists caught out Turn your dream of owning a hip cafe or bar into a reality.
